pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Data Visualization with Tours and Embeddings // Compose interactive visualisations designed for exploratory high-dimensional data analysis. With 'liminal' you can create linked interactive graphics to diagnose the quality of a dimension reduction technique and explore the global structure of a dataset with a tour. A complete description of the method is discussed in ['Lee' 'Laa' 'Cook' (2020) arXiv:2012.06077].
